verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I enter the Holy of Holies
I enter through the blood of the Lamb
I enter to worship You only
I enter to honor I AM

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Lord I worship You, I worship You,
Lord I worship You, I worship You,

verse.name: b1
verse.lines:
For Your name is Holy, Holy Lord
For Your name is Holy, Holy Lord
